Posts.Content: Well, I have had dcis, too, and had been taking Evista for several years. I only took in every other day. Now I am taking it everyday. I actually statrted taking it to prevent Osteo. It didn't do a thing to prevent cancer. Who knows if it will do anything for osteo either! Time will tell, I guess. Best of luck, Carrot-top.
Posts.Title: Is Evista the answer?
